publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-47 Brian Adam: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to investigate all available means to expediate the building of a peripheral route around Aberdeen. (lodged 9 June 1999) Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Andrew Welsh, Irene McGugan, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe.
S1M-47 Ben Wallace*, Alex Johnstone*, Mike Rumbles*, Elaine Thomson*, Lewis Macdonald*

S1M-47 Brian Adam: That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to investigate all available means to expedite the building of a peripheral route around Aberdeen. (lodged on 9 June 1999) Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Andrew Welsh, Irene McGugan, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe, Ben Wallace, Alex Johnstone, Mike Rumbles, Elaine Thomson, Lewis Macdonald

*S1M-47 Brian Adam: That the Parliament call upon the Scottish Ministers to investigate all available means to expedite the building of a peripheral route around Aberdeen. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Andrew Welsh, Irene McGugan, Mr David Davidson, Nora Radcliffe.
